title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 21 ยง 6.2 - Notice of hearing
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 21 ยง 6.2 - Notice of hearing

State Regulations

The notice of the hearing shall be in writing and shall state
the time and place of and the matters to be considered at the hearing, and
shall be served at least 10 days prior to the date of the hearing upon the
party in interest. Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes
R. & Regs. Tit. 21
ยง
6.2

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
